query:
SELECT 
  p.id, 
  p.vendaId, 
  p.tipo, 
  p.valor, 
  p.valorLiquido, 
  p.bandeira, 
  p.parcelas, 
  p.cvNsu,
  DATE_FORMAT(v.dataVenda, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s') as dataVendaFormatada,
  v.dataVenda,
  v.valorTotal as valorTotalVenda
FROM pagamentos p
INNER JOIN vendas v ON v.id = p.vendaId
WHERE p.cvNsu = '18913508';

  DATE_FORMAT(v.dataVenda, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s') as dataVendaFormatada,
  v.dataVenda,
  v.valorTotal as valorTotalVenda
FROM pagamentos p
INNER JOIN vendas v ON v.id = p.vendaId
WHERE p.cvNsu = '18913508';
